metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2680 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: This CVE exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2021-3750. More specifically, the qemu-kvm package as released for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.1 via RHSA-2022:7967 included a version of qemu-kvm that was actually missing the fix for CVE-2021-3750.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This is a Red Hat specific CVE that only applied to their package, and not the qemu package in any other distro, including Ubuntu

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
